# ion-footer

Footer is a root component of a page that sits at the bottom of the page.
Footer can be a wrapper for ion-toolbar to make sure the content area is sized correctly.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                                                                    | Type            | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------- | ----------- |
| `mode`        | `mode`        | The mode determines which platform styles to use.                                                                                                                              | `"ios" \| "md"` | `undefined` |
| `translucent` | `translucent` | If `true`, the footer will be translucent. Note: In order to scroll content behind the footer, the `fullscreen` attribute needs to be set on the content. Defaults to `false`. | `boolean`       | `false`     |


----------------------------------------------
